page.title: 01DEAN FARM
page.content: { THE FARM IS OWNED BY MR.IVORY.THE FARM COVERS AN AREA OF 400 ACRES OF FLAT CHALKLAND.MR.IVORY KEEPS 400 CATTLE, FATTENING 300 TO SELL & KEEPING 100 TO RENEW THE HERD.HE HAS FRENCH BREEDS: BLONDE AQUITAINES,LIMOUSINES & CHAROL- AIS,EXPECTING Â£600 FOR A COW AT 18 MONTHS.HE OWNS 200 SHEEP.HE HAS 500 PIGS WITH 80 SOWS & BUYS IN MALES TO GET NEW BLOODLINES.HE WOULD EXPECT Â£60 FOR A PORKER.IN ANY ONE LITTER HE HOPES FOR AT LEAST 10 PIGLETS.A FEMALE PIG WEIGHS 200-300 KILOS.HE IS ABLE TO PRODUCE HIS OWN STRAW,BUT IN HARD WINTERS HE HAS TO BUY IN HAY.HE EMPLOYS 3 WORKERS & HIS FARM COULD BE DESCRIBED AS A 'FAIRLY WELL EQUIPPED MODERN FARM'.THE FARM'S MARKETS ARE TRING,NORTHHAMPTON & BANBURY.
